data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lotzkat, Sebastian, Hertz, Andreas, Köhler, Gunther (2012): A new species of Sibon (Squamata: Colubroidea: Dipsadidae) from the Cordillera Central of western Panama, with comments on other species of the genus in the area. Zootaxa 3485: 26-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.208860
